knimeNode.name: Unpivoting
knimeNode.shortDescription: This node rotates the selected columns from the input table to rows and duplicates at the same time the remaining input columns by appending them to each corresponding output row.

fullDescription.intro:
This node rotates the selected columns from the input table to rows and duplicates at the same time the remaining input columns by appending them to each corresponding output row. Example:
Input: Value1 Value2 Value3 Extra1 Extra2 Extra3 Output: Value1 Extra1 Extra2 Extra3 Value2 Extra1 Extra2 Extra3 Value3 Extra1 Extra2 Extra3

tab.name: Value columns
tab.option: This list contains the names of the columns that are rotated into one single column.
Skip all rows containing missing cells in selected value column(s).

tab.name: Retained columns
tab.option: This list contains the column names of the columns which are duplicated by the number of selected value columns.

tab.name: Manual
tab.option: Use these buttons to move columns between the Include and Exclude list. Single-arrow buttons will move all selected columns. Double-arrow buttons will move all columns (filtering is taken into account).
Controls what happens with new columns when the input table changes. If this placeholder is in the include list, then new columns are included, otherwise they are excluded.

tab.name: Wildcard/Regex
tab.option: Type a search pattern which matches columns to move into the Include or Exclude list. Which list is used can be specified. You can use either Wildcards ('?' matching any character, '*' matching a sequence of any characters) or Regex. You can specify whether your pattern should be case sensitive and whether the pattern defines the includes or the excludes.

tab.name: Types
tab.option: Select the column types that you want to include.

tab.name: Advanced settings
tab.option: Advanced setting that if selected enables hiliting between input and output data.

ports.inPort: Input table with at least one value column for the unpivoting operation.
ports.outPort: Unpivoting table with duplicated columns together with rotated value columns and their corresponding column names.
